definition: to play/to have fun/to trifle with/toy/sth used for amusement/curio or antique (Taiwan pr. [wan4])/to keep sth for entertainment

sentences.english: He is both an expert, and master in antique authentication.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位鉴定古玩的行家里手。

sentences.english: There's something for everyone at the Bermondsey Antique Market.
sentences.chinese: 在伯蒙德西古玩市场有适合每个人的东西。

sentences.english: Diarmuid: Second-hand and antiquarian books, and sheet music; they have something for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 他们还有旧书和古物古玩类的书刊和各种乐谱。

sentences.english: This curio has passed throgh many hands.
sentences.chinese: 这种古玩已经多次转手了。

sentences.english: I ran upon this old print in the antique shop.
sentences.chinese: 我在那古玩店里意外地发现了这张老版画。

sentences.english: Chen Liangshao's epitaph was discovered in 2002 to be possessed by a curio merchant.
sentences.chinese: 陈良绍墓志于2002年春在古玩商人处发现。

sentences.english: The antiques, cultural relics, scripts and paintings available at this market are also inexpensive.
sentences.chinese: 红桥市场的文物字画和古玩也以价格低廉为特色。

sentences.english: Antique shops exert a peculiar fascination on a great many people.
sentences.chinese: 古玩店对许多人来说都有一种特殊的魅力。

sentences.english: All the experts presented found it very difficult to assess the value of the antique.
sentences.chinese: 所有在场的专家都觉很难对这件古玩进行估价。

sentences.english: Xian antique market, The Wenbaozhai tourism and shopping center.
sentences.chinese: 西安古玩市场，文宝斋旅游购物中心。

sentences.english: We saw a Ming dynasty carved wooden pillow in the store.
sentences.chinese: 我们在古玩店看见了一只明代的雕花木枕。

sentences.english: He enjoyed a great reputation as an antiquarian.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个享有盛名的古玩收藏家。

sentences.english: Don't trifle away your time on curio hunting.
sentences.chinese: 别把时间都浪费在搜集古玩上面。

sentences.english: You'll have to pay through the nose for those curios.
sentences.chinese: 你买那些古玩得花大钱。

sentences.english: Decorated with Donghia furniture and Asian and Indian antiques and artifacts.
sentences.chinese: 起居室装饰着唐西亚家具及亚洲和印度的古玩和文物。

sentences.english: Some tourists who are keen on art may wish to buy antique objects as well as Chinese calligraphy and paintings.
sentences.chinese: 爱好艺术的游客，还可以在中国购买字画和古玩。

definition: the strokes of a character/calligraphy and painting
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
